entry.title: Chat with {{name}}!
entry.subtitle: I can recommend products or answer any questions you have!

start.title:
Hello
I am a fashion stylist at {{botName}} who helps you with your shopping :)

history.notExist2: Please press the 'Start New Chat' button to begin the conversation!

socket.connect: Hello! How can I assist you?
socket.close: This chat has ended! ðŸ¥² If you have any remaining questions, please select 'Restart Chat' from the menu!
socket.recommend1: I will show you the requested product! Select a product to view the details.
socket.recommend2: Please let me know if you would like a recommendation for a different product!

error.NOT_ALLOWED: I'm sorry, but it seems difficult for me to answer that. Can you provide another input?
error.OPENAI_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE:
Oops! It's a busy time with many customers right now!
Please send your message again!
error.OUTPUT_NOT_PARSED:
Oops! It's a busy time with many customers right now!
Please send your message again!
error.CONNECT_FAILED: Connection to the server failed. Please refresh.
error.CHAT_LIMIT_EXCEEDED:
The conversation ended due to insufficient information for recommendations. ðŸ¥²
Please reconnect and provide more specific details!
error.NO_PRODUCT_RECOMMENDED: It seems like there isn't a perfect product for youðŸ¥². Do you have any other help you need?
